name: N3K Challenge: The Graveyard
description:
If this is a project you would like to see made into a full game please comment or donate or both!
Thank You All! :)

Tim
EmeraldDev

This game was made in less than a week for N3K's Weekly challenge for Nov 5, 2017

Right Click to Move player and interact with items/npcs.
Left Click to attack

'I' To open character panel and to close it.

Fixed the questing issue. Pressing 'Q' will bring up the quest log.

Added some effects for leveling and fixed the food and potions.

still need to add the staff and the spellbook functionality.
